name: Save The Graveyard
description:
A new curse is spreading in the air, and this leads to the resurrection of the undead making them Zombies !!!

Explore the area by killing all the Zombies in order to defeat the curse, and collect all the pills. But watch out .... the zombies could take over and kill you !!!

CONTROLS:

WASD = Movements;

Space Bar = Jump;

Left Mouse Button = Shoot.

As the game was designed for the game jam "" Kenney Jam 2020 ", it is not without bugs and some shortcomings. Having been made by one person in less than 48 hours I  would like to apologize about this, but I hope you like and enjoy with this kind of a demo and I will continue to work on it to expand it and fix bugsone.

And please leave a comment to find out what you think, and for advice!!
